REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1845 reute h f BC-DOTRONIX-<DOTX.O>-COM 06-01 0046

TEXT.TITLE: DOTRONIX <DOTX.O> COMPLETES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Dotronix Inc said it completed the acquisition of Video Monitors Inc for 3.92 mln dlrs. Video Monitors is a privately-owned Wisconsin-based manufacturer of video display and and video monitor devices. Reuter
